name: Shrinky Spheres 'n' Big Balls
description:
Shrinky Spheres is a two player game where your objective is to knock the other player off the map.

Your player's size changes randomly, which affects your speed and the strength of your blast attack.

Controls:

Player 1 (Red):

W,A and D to move around, press Space for a blast attack.

Double tap a direction for a dash.

Player 2 (Blue):

Arrow Keys to move around, press Right Control for a blast attack.

Double tap a direction for a dash.

Enjoy!
